document.full_text: thanks to last week's $1.17 billion deal, mayor daley can go forward with the o'hare airport expansion, but the master plan is going to cost a lot more than originally estimated.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: unfinished business at o'hare
lines_and_colors: thanks to last week's $1.17 billion deal, mayor daley can go forward with the o'hare airport expansion, but the master plan is going to cost a lot more than originally estimated.
